text: The Swiss Hitparade (German: Schweizer Hitparade) is Switzerland's main music sales charts. The charts are a record of the highest-selling albums in various styles of music in Switzerland. == List of Swiss charts == *Singles Top 75 *Singles Top 100 *Albums Top 100 *Compilations Top 25 *Airplay Top 30 == Updates == The charts are updated weekly on Sundays. Category:Record charts Category:Swiss culture
title: Swiss Hitparade
